game.name: Ginga Force
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Fight over the Earth-like planet of Seventia and its scarce resources of Septonium. A vertical shoot ’em up at its core with an added focus towards immersive storytelling. Follow the story of Alex and Margaret, two exceptional pilots, for the first time on Steam.
